author: Richard Hall, Richard Hall
title: Coronavirus: Georgia governor only just discovers that Covid-19 spreads before symptoms show
description: Public health officials have long known of asymptomatic transmission of the virus
content:
The governor of Georgia said he only recently discovered that coronavirus patients could transmit the virus before they showed any symptoms, as he announced plans for a belated shelter-in-place order across the state. 
Governor Brian Kemp had earlier urged G… [+6028 chars]
